import{createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";var popupInitial={isShow:false,index:null};var popupSlice=createSlice({//dispatch hien thi trang thai popup
name:"popupSlice",initialState:popupInitial,reducers:{showPopup:function showPopup(state,action){state.isShow=true;state.index=action.payload;},hidePopup:function hidePopup(state){state.isShow=false;}}});export var popupActions=popupSlice.actions;export default popupSlice.reducer;
